article.headline: Shattuck Labs stock surges in its debut, opens 30% above its IPO price
article.body: Shares of Shattuck Labs Inc. STTK, +13.82% soared in their public debut, as they opened 30% above the initial public offering price. The stock's first trade was at $22.10 at 11:10 a.m. Eastern for 559,586 shares. The IPO was priced at $17 a share, above the expected range of $14 to $16 a share. The Texas-based biotechnology company raised $202.0 million in the upsized IPO, and the pricing valued the company at $647.4 million. The stock has pulled back some since its open, to be trading up 12.4% in morning trading. Meanwhile, the Renaissance IPO ETF IPO, +1.98% was rising 2.0% and the S&P 500 SPX, +0.87% was tacking on 0.6%.
